Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Zhuo H, Zhang X, Li M, Zhang Q, Wang Y.2022
Literature.Title: Antibacterial and Anti-Inflammatory Properties of a Novel Antimicrobial Peptide Derived from LL-37.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (75%) toKR-12K: 33%, I=R: 17%.Activity: weakly active against S. Gordonii (MIC 96.7 uM). Warning: other bacteria not tested. It inhbited formation of biofilms:bacteria. It suppressed LPS-induced IL-6 similarly to KR-12.
